text: Oakland County is a county in the U.S. state of Michigan. As of the 2020 census, 1,274,395 people lived there, making it the second-most populous county in Michigan, after neighboring Wayne County. The county seat is Pontiac. The county was created on March 28, 1820. == References == Category:1820 establishments in the United States Category:1820s establishments in Michigan Territory Category:Michigan counties
title: Oakland County, Michigan
